data.title: Pitch Perfect 2
data.meta_description: Uncover the derpiest meanings in the songs of Pitch Perfect 2 with Lyrics Layers. Dive deep into  "Riff Off",  "World Championship (Finale 2)",  "World Championship (Finale 1)",  and explore the heart of more songs!
data.text:
Pitch Perfect 2 is not an artist but rather a musical comedy film released in 2015, directed by Elizabeth Banks. The film is a sequel to the original Pitch Perfect and features an ensemble cast including Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson, and Hailee Steinfeld. It focuses on the story of the Barden Bellas, an all-female acapella group, as they navigate competitions and personal challenges.

The soundtrack of Pitch Perfect 2 underscores themes of female empowerment and unity, celebrating women's strength and solidarity. The film and its music highlight diverse musical genres and body positivity, promoting an inclusive message about embracing oneself and supporting one another.
